meanings.definition: Relating to or suffering from astigmatism.
meanings.sent1: The astigmatic patient needed special glasses to see clearly.
meanings.sent2: Her astigmatic vision made it difficult to read small print.
meanings.sent3: The astigmatic cat kept bumping into walls while chasing a laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: His astigmatic view of the world distorted his perception of reality.
meanings.sent5: The astigmatic lens blurred the edges of everything he saw.
